original_text: When they arrived, they prayed for the new believers there that they might receive the Holy Spirit,
korean_text: 그들이 내려가서 그들을 위하여 성령 받기를 기도하니

sentences.original_text: they prayed for new believers there
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그곳의 새로운 신자들을 위해 기도했습니다

sentences.original_text: that they might receive Holy Spirit,
